All Classes

Class
Description
BaseGenerator
a JDKRandom generator, base for other generators.
BaseNode
The BaseNode interface is a base interface for the node class to use for the simulator.simulator.
BattleConfirmation
Is an event to confirm the battle invitations.
BattleInvitation
BattleInvitation is an event to send battle invitations to another nodes.
BattleResult
BattleResult is an event to declare the result of the battle between two nodes.
Block
Block is a serializable object which consist of uuid, owner, validators, height, prevBlock, and transactions.
CollectTransactionsEvent
Collects Transactions submitted to a node.
ConfirmBlockEvent
It checks validation of block event in a node.
ConfirmTransactionEvent
Checks validation of transaction event.
Contestant
Contestants are nodes that participate the battles.
CounterCollector
The CounterCollector interface is a base interface of counter collector to use for metric collector.
DeliverLatestBlockEvent
updates nodes block to the latestBlock.
DeliverTransactionsEvent
Delivers transaction to a node.
Event
The Event interface is a base interface for the events that the nodes will communicate with each other through.
ExponentialGenerator
Exponential generator which uses logarithm to generate numbers.
FixtureEvent
A basic Event to use to check whether Underlays coded correctly.
FixtureEvent
A basic Event to use to check whether utils coded correctly.
FixtureNode
A basic BaseNode to check whether Underlays coded correctly or not.
FixtureNode
A basic BaseNode to check whether utils coded correctly or not.
GaugeCollector
The GaugeCollector interface is a base interface of collector to use for metric collector.
GaussianGenerator
A generator which uses rand.nextGaussian to generate.
GetLatestBlockEvent
Getter of the latest block event.
HistogramCollector
The CounterCollector interface is a base interface of counter collector to use for metric collector.
JavaRmiHost
Represents the Java RMI Service implementation.
JavaRmiService
Represents a Java RMI Service.
JavaRmiUnderlay
Java RMI connection underlay implementation.
LightChainNode
A LightChainNode represents a single node of the LightChain protocol.
LocalHandler
Sends request to a middle layer.
LocalUnderlay
Serves as the LocalUnderlay layer of the simulator.
Main
Hello Servers is a simulator example which consist of 5 nodes.
Main
Servers battle is a simulator with 4 nodes.
metrics
Represents a metric for the simulator.
MetricsCollector
Metric collector is a collector which consists of histogram collector, gauge collector and counter collector.
MiddleLayer
Represents a mediator between the overlay and the underlay.
MyNode
MyNode is a basenode to be fixture node for the helloservers simulation.
NodeThread<T extends BaseNode>
A Node object which can do tasks that a basenode can do.
NoopCollector
Noop Collector is a no operation metric collector.
NoopOrchestrator
NoopOrchestrator implements an orchestrator for testing.
Orchestrator
Orchestrator is an interface for simulator.
ReadyEvent
Ready Event is an event which can be used to declare a node is ready.
Request
Represents a serializable request packet what wrap an event.
SendHello
Sendhello is an event which enables node to send "Thank You" if the message is "Hello" else sends "Hello" message back to that node.
Serialization
Contains various static helper methods to be used by the udp underlay implementation.
SharedVariable
local static variable between the nodes with a buffer size of 1 (any two consecutive writing on the same variable is forbidden).
SimpleEntryComparable<K extends Comparable<? super K>,​V>
Can be used to construct entries that comparable.
SimulatedLatencyTest
Tests latency of simulator.
Simulation
Simulation uses simulator to simulate an event with given number of given node and in a given duration of time.
simulator<T extends BaseNode>
simulator simulates situations between nodes with actions performed between the nodes.
SimulatorCollector
simulator Collector is a prometheus-based metric collector which uses simulator counter, gauge and histogram.
SimulatorCounter
This class provides a prometheus-based counter for extracting metrics For every registered metric, the metric will be collected for each node separately Counters can be incremented but never decremented.
SimulatorGauge
This class provides a prometheus-based gauge for extracting metrics For every registered metric, the metric will be collected for each node separately Gauges can be incremented and decremented.
SimulatorHistogram
This class provides a prometheus-based histogram for extracting metrics.
SimulatorMetric
simulator metric which consist of types and informative constant variables.
SimulatorUtils
static class for providing various utils related to the simulator.
StopStartEvent
StopStartEvent is an event can be used to call onstart or onstop method of the node.
SubmitBlockEvent
Appends new block to the node.
SubmitTransactionEvent
Adds a new transaction to a node.
TcpHandler
Represents a thread that handles an incoming tcp request and emits a response.
TcpListener
Implements a routine that continuously listens a local tcp port and delegates the handling of each received request to a `TCPHandler` thread.
TcpUnderlay
tcp underlay implementation.
Transaction
Transaction is a serializable object which consist of uuid, owner, validators, and prevBlock.
UdpHandler
Represents a thread that handles a udp request and emits a response.
UdpListener
Implements a routine that continuously listens a local udp port for requests and responses, and delegates the handling of each received request to a `UDPHandler` thread and each received response to the main `UDPUnderlay` thread.
UdpUnderlay
udp underlay implementation.
UdpUtils
Contains various static helper methods to be used by the udp underlay implementation.
underlay
Represents the underlay layer of the simulator.
UnderlayFactory
UnderlayFactory is a factory which consists of Underlays.
UnderlayTest
Test the communication and termination of every network underlay.
UnderlayType
consists of type of the underlays.
UniformGenerator
Uniform number generator which generates number between max and min randomly.
ValidateBlockEvent
Validates the given block for the node.
ValidateTransactionEvent
Validates the given transaction for the node.
WeibullGenerator
Weibull Generator generates number using Weibull Distribution.
